Project Name: Chad Second Programmatic Economic Recovery and Resilience Grant
Project Development Objective: The Program Development Objectives and pillars of the proposed series are to (1) enhance fiscal risk management; (2) improve oil revenue transparency and management; (3) promote resilience and economic diversification in key real sectors; and (4) increase social protection for the poor and vulnerable.
Abstract: The development objectives and pillars of Second Programmatic Economic Recovery and Resilience Development Policy Financing Project are to (1) enhance fiscal risk management; (2) improve oil revenue transparency and management; (3) promote resilience and economic diversification in key real sectors; and (4) increase social protection for the poor and vulnerable. This operation is the second in a programmatic series of two development policy grants for the period 2017-2020, and is well aligned with the strategic objectives of the 2017-2021 national development plan (NDP).

Project Name: Dedicated Grant Mechanism for Cote d'Ivoire
Project Development Objective: The Project Development Objective is to strengthen the capacity of targeted local communities to participate in REDD+ processes at the local, national, and global levels.
